name: Arisa Run
description:
Welcome to Arisa Run! 

Run through the maze, collect as many crystals as you can, and find your way out

Get through the levels using:  

A (move left) D (move right)  W (move forward)  S (move backward) SPACE (jump)

Use a mouse/touchpad to look around and press the shift button to sprint/run

When finished with the game, feel free to leave some feedback through this google form! https://forms.gle/zwvFNT9ZQL6TQ8Fr5
